messages.content: When working people succeed Scotland succeeds. That's why we need to do things differently. We need to call an end to the current failing austerity policies that are affecting so many families.

issues.education: Our schools are the best in the country and they should stay that way.
issues.socialWelfare: We need to do things differently to end austerity policies affecting families.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have always stood up for our area and always will do.

contactInformation.address: Suite A3, Spiersbridge Way, Thornliebank, G46 8NG

quotes.text: East Renfrewshire is a great place to live and work.
